subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: The wild-eyed Pence, who had a home run and a double in Game 1 of the World Series, has been integral to the Giants’ success since he arrived in 2012.
snippet: The wild-eyed Pence, who had a home run and a double in Game 1 of the World Series, has been integral to the Giants’ success since he arrived in 2012.
